action

Class OneStepAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • action.Action
      • action.OneStepAction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreeResourceAction, TakeResourceAction

    public class OneStepAction
extends Action
    This class defines a one step action which means that this action only needs one step to be finished
    Author:
    Alexandre LEFEBVRE - Thomas OSTROWSKI
